me.simple-description: **Helping** companies achieve their goals, doing what I **love**
me.about-me-description:
Hello, my name is Christian Bravo, a Frontend Developer from Guatemala with a great passion for web development using modern technologies. 

 I enjoy solving problems, creating dynamic and intuitive user interfaces, developing rich web applications and experiences. 

 Outside of the office you will find me playing soccer, collecting cactus and spending time with my pets and family.

home.no-recent-projects-message: Sorry, I'm still working on this section, you will see my projects soon :)

error.404-description: Sorry, but this page doesn't exist.

contact-me.contact-me-description: I'm always open to discuss about projects and new challenges, do not hesitate to contact me and let's talk.

description: Development and maintenance of web applications, landing pages and internal tools for international clients
Write modern, performant and maintainable code adopting clean code culture
Communication with multi disciplinary teams of developers, designers, producers, and clients on a daily basis
Experience in writing and executing test cases and test scenarios
Experience in Sanity, Functional, System and Regression testing
Communication with developers and product analysts in order to understand and analyze testing status
Create technical documentation and user guidelines
